sqls.sql: SELECT me_sn_part_id, me_sn_part_info_no, me_sn_part_info_name, me_sn_part_info_value, me_sn_part_info_rmk01, me_sn_part_info_rmk02, me_sn_part_info_rmk03, me_sn_part_info_rmk04, me_sn_part_info_rmk05, me_sn_part_info_rmk06, me_sn_part_info_rmk07, me_sn_part_info_rmk08, me_sn_part_info_rmk09, me_sn_part_info_rmk10, me_sn_part_info_rmk11, me_sn_part_info_rmk12, me_sn_part_info_rmk13, me_sn_part_info_rmk14, me_sn_part_info_rmk15, me_sn_part_info_rmk16, me_sn_part_info_rmk17, me_sn_part_info_rmk18, me_sn_part_info_rmk19, me_sn_part_info_rmk20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM me_sn_part_info WHERE me_sn_part_info_id = @me_sn_part_info_id;
